name: diffai
description: Shows meaningful diffs for ML model files. Learning rate changes, gradient health, layer additions and deletions at a glance.

og.title: diffai
og.description: Semantic diff tool for AI/ML models

features.title: 11 Auto Analyses
features.description: Learning rate, optimizer, loss, accuracy, model version, gradient, quantization, convergence, activation, attention, ensemble.

features.title: Tensor Statistics
features.description: Compare mean, std, min, max. Detects shape changes and parameter additions/deletions.

features.title: JSON/YAML Output
features.description: --output json/yaml for machine-readable output. Detect model changes in CI/CD.
